title: any ap life steal items?? i think there should be a few
body:

No, they deleted it because {{champion:8}} and {{champion:82}} were the only champions that really used it so it was primarily balanced around them, and if it was too strong they had to nerf it then it ended up being useless, so they just got rid of it from items
